data: NICU/PED Newborn End of Life Comfort Care
Plan to transfer to Canuck Place Children's Hospital on discharge
No cardiorespiratory monitoring, only check at families' request or per patient status changes
Skin to skin, oral care, warmth provision and other comfort care measures as clinically appropriate
